keywords: draw me nearer hindi, tera hu e rab

verse.name: v1
lines: tera hu e rab sunta teri bat
jo batati tera pyar
Mai iman ke sath ata tere pas
tera hi hu talabgar
Rakh tu mujhko, mujhko, mujhko e
masih jahan chashma krus se khas
rakh tu mujhko, mujhko, mujhko e
masih apne jakhmi pahlu pas

verse.name: v2
lines: mujhko pak kar ab ki me tera kam
karu dil se theek o khub
teri marji pak mujhse puri ho
meri marji ho maglub(2)
Rakh tu mujhko, mujhko, mujhko e
masih jahan chashma krus se khas (2)
rakh tu mujhko, mujhko, mujhko e
masih apne jakhmi pahlu pas

verse.name: v3
lines: kesi rahath khas dilko milti hai
jab me jatha pak huzur..(2)
jab me dua me ata tere pas tab tu
karta hai masrur  (2)
rakh tu mujhko, mujhko, mujhko e
masih jahan chashmakrus se khas (2)
rakh tu mujhko, mujhko, mujhko e
masih apne jakhmi pahlu pas

verse.name: v4
lines: tera meeta pyaar aur bhi janunga jab
me jaunga asman
jab me dekhunga tere chehre ko tab
khush hogi meri jan
rakh tu mujhko, mujhko, mujhko e
masih jahan chashma krus se khas (2)
rakh tu mujhko, mujhko, mujhko e
masih apne jakhmi pahlu pas
